${ModID}:MixUp.NAME: Mix-Up
${ModID}:MixUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If target's block is broken, ${ModID}:Get_Hyped

${ModID}:Setup.NAME: Setup
${ModID}:Setup.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Get_Hyped. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:Finisher.NAME: Finisher
${ModID}:Finisher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust if not Fatal.

${ModID}:MeterManagement.NAME: Meter Management
${ModID}:MeterManagement.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to your Hype. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AssistCharacter.NAME: Assist Character
${ModID}:AssistCharacter.DESCRIPTION: Choose another character. At the start of each turn, add an ${ModID}:Echo of a random card from their card pool to your hand.
${ModID}:AssistCharacter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose another character. At the start of each turn, add an ${ModID}:Echo of a random card from their card pool to your hand. It gains ${ModID}:Get_Hyped

${ModID}:OverheadStrike.NAME: Overhead Strike
${ModID}:OverheadStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ChargePunch.NAME: Charge Punch
${ModID}:ChargePunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn.

${ModID}:Punish.NAME: Punish
${ModID}:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next time you fully block an attack this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to the attacker.

${ModID}:c5050.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.
${ModID}:c5050.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Get_Hyped.

${ModID}:SweetChinMusic.NAME: Sweet Chin Music
${ModID}:SweetChinMusic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target takes unblocked damage, Stun them. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:RunawayTrain.NAME: Runaway Train
${ModID}:RunawayTrain.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play a 0-cost card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.
